text: The 1961 Volta a Catalunya was the 41st edition of the Volta a Catalunya cycle race and was held from 17 September to 24 September 1961. The race started in Montjuïc and finished in Barcelona. The race was won by Henri Duez. ==General classification== {| |Final general classification {| class="wikitable" |- ! scope="col" | Rank ! scope="col" | Rider ! scope="col" | Time |- | style="text-align:center;" | 1 | | style="text-align:right;" | |- | style="text-align:center;" | 2 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 1' 17" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 3 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 3' 02" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 4 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 6' 29" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 5 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 7' 49" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 6 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 03" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 7 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 15" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 8 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 36" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 9 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 9' 54" |- | style="text-align:center;" | 10 | | style="text-align:right;" | + 10' 25" |} |} ==References== 1961 Volta Category:1961 in Spanish road cycling Category:September 1961 sports events
